solution_line_template: The vacuum cleaner costs ${vacuum_cost}, so Daria needs {vacuum_cost} - {initial_collected} = $<<{vacuum_cost}-{initial_collected}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} more.
Daria will need {money_needed} / {weekly_contribution} = <<{money_needed}/{weekly_contribution}={weeks_needed}>>{weeks_needed} more weeks, to be able to buy the vacuum cleaner.
